com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class VirtualHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.VirtualHost

  • public final class VirtualHost
extends java.lang.Object
    A name-based virtual host. A VirtualHost contains the following information:
    • the hostname pattern, as defined in the section 3.1 of RFC2818
    • SslContext if TLS is enabled
    • the list of available Services and their PathMappings
    See Also:
    VirtualHostBuilder

      Server server()
      Returns the Server where this VirtualHost belongs to.
      java.util.List<ServiceConfig> serviceConfigs()
      Returns the information about the Services bound to this virtual host.

      Returns the SslContext of this virtual host.
